body.name: Bidet Sprayer for Toilet, Stainless Steel Sprayer Attachment for Feminine Wash, Baby Diaper Cloth Washer and Shower Sprayer for Pet, Wall or Toilet Mount, Golden
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 57 mins
features: 【STAINLESS STEEL SPRAYER HEAD】：Only compatible with 7/8" toilet.The FREDI bidet sprayer consists of a 304 stainless steel bidet nozzle, a stainless steel hose and a brass valve Resistant to corrosion and corrosion Better protect your sanitation.

【MULTIPLE USES】：FREDI hand held bidet sprayer is a great suitable for the whole family, especially for anyone with limited mobility due to surgery, arthritis, postpartum or injuries, ideal for elderly adults, can be used as cloth diaper sprayer, bathroom cleaning and even for pet washing.

【Better Personal Hygiene】:The handheld bidet sprayer has 2 water pressure modes, Jet spray and Soft spray modes. Control the water pressure for a gentle and thorough clean up. An ideal choice for women during pregnancy and menstrual cycles.

【Easy to Install】:in 10 minutes without professional plumbing help, the holder can be mounted on the toilet or on a wall.When installing this unit be sure that the water supply valve by your toilet is fully turned off and that there is no flow/leak of water before removing any plumbing components from your toilet.

【After-Sale Service】: Please turn off the shut off T-Value Adapter lever after each use to close the water supply to the sprayer head. Manufacturer is not responsible for damage which may have been caused by failure to follow this recommendation.If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us through Amazon email. We will solve the problem for you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have Upgrade for Every Bathroom!
reviews.reviewText: PS: If you're ready to upgrade your bathroom experience, the Bidet Sprayer for Toilet Handheld is a must-have addition. Say goodbye to traditional methods and welcome a new level of comfort, cleanliness, and versatility. Whether it's for personal hygiene, pet care, or cloth diaper cleaning, this sprayer will quickly become an indispensable tool in your daily routine. Don't miss out on the benefits – make the smart choice for your bathroom today!The Bidet Sprayer for Toilet Handheld has completely transformed my bathroom experience, and I can't imagine going back to the days without it. This stainless steel sprayer attachment is a game-changer, offering unparalleled convenience, hygiene, and versatility that cater to a variety of needs.What immediately caught my attention was the build quality of the sprayer. The stainless steel construction not only ensures durability but also adds a touch of modern elegance to my bathroom. It's clear that this product is designed to last, making it a worthwhile investment for any household.The versatility of this bidet sprayer is truly impressive. From feminine hygiene needs to cleaning cloth diapers and even giving my pet a quick and gentle wash, this sprayer does it all. It's a multi-purpose tool that proves its value time and time again, making it an essential addition to any bathroom.Installation was a breeze – it comes with all the necessary components, and I was able to choose between wall or toilet mount based on my preference. The adjustable water pressure feature is a thoughtful touch, allowing me to customize the experience according to my comfort. The convenience of having this sprayer within arm's reach has made a world of difference in my daily routine.The Bidet Sprayer for Toilet Handheld isn't just about convenience – it's also about hygiene and environmental consciousness. The gentle and effective cleansing provided by this sprayer promotes better personal hygiene and significantly reduces the need for excessive toilet paper usage. It's a win-win for both cleanliness and sustainability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sprayer for toilet
reviews.reviewText: This sprayer is amazing and I’m using it everyday in my bathroom to clean the bath tub and the sink. Make my life easy and the quality is excellent. I definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best thus far
reviews.reviewText: I have used couple of different bidets at my home but non of them worked like this one. First of all I loved the package itself and It comes with a complete set of instruments for installation. It's easy to set up and the two modes of adjustable water flow is neat. It never leaks unlike other bidets which I've used and I will definitely buy more for my guest bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this bidet as a sprayer for cleaning items (mainly dirty shoes) in the toilet bowl. It works excellently for this purpose. That is because the spray that comes out of this thing is like a firehose. Holy cow! I would not use this anywhere near your nether regions or it might blow your booty hole off. This was super easy to install - you simply unscrew one hose, attach the 3 way valve, and attach the hoses. It also looks great. I highly recommend this for anyone using it to clean (shoes, cloth diapers, mop buckets), but NOT for a bidet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality product
reviews.reviewText: Good quality product, but after 10 months of usage, it leak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke, Flooded Our Bathroom & Hallway
reviews.reviewText: Had it for about a year with very light use. Today the hose exploded off of the handle and was gushing water around our bathroom! Praise God my wife found it and pointed the hose of water into the tub, and I was also home to the water supply off for her. That was a $$,$$$ mess in the making.Read the one-star reviews. More than a dozen other people have had similar situations. Seriously, if you buy this and it happens to you while you're out to dinner (or worse, on vacation), you could have wrecked flooring, trim, framing, drywall, and furniture in multiple rooms and mold remediation bills that cost a fortune. We had two whole rooms flooded after less than two minutes of water running, and we were home and ready! I am super disappointed with this product, and there is no way I'd ever buy one of these again.Installation was simple (there are a number of bidets like this one, and they mostly all install the same way). Turns out the build quality was terrible. The "metal" feeling hose has a simple rubber one inside. The rubber one is the only one anchored in the handle. The metal hose is just a sleeve. My guess is that the cut-off end of the metal sleeve must have nicked the rubber hose inside, and then the pressure finished the job. We had not used the bidet in several weeks when it ruptured today--the failure had nothing to do with our use.The manufacturer needs to redesign the hose connections. From other reviews, it also seems like the valves are so-so and often leak (thankfully we didn't have that issue). This product failure was unacceptable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bidet sprayer is a fantastic addition to my bathroom! It's incredibly handy and easy to use. It works like a charm for personal hygiene and other cleaning tasks. Installing it was a breeze, and it has quickly become an essential part of my bathroom routine. I highly recommend this
